title: idhi vELa
sahitya:
idi vELa nannEla Isha sutA nIku



anupallavi



 mudamutO ninnE pADi monaciyunnAnu vEDi



caraNam



 vara matamulanu pondina shUra padmAdulanu koTTi surulaku sura lOkamosagi vidhi matamaNaka

 kaTTi dharashabara tanaya centa cEri peNDlATi harikEshapuramunandu nelakonna muddugADa
